definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="raytrace_distance">raytrace_distance</variable><variable type="String" id="found_entity_name">found_entity_name</variable><variable type="Boolean" id="entity_found">entity_found</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:raytrace_distance</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This increases whenever  an entity is still not found</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:entity_found</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="controls_repeat_ext"><value name="TIMES"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">15</field><comment pinned="false" h="231" w="425">Here, you should set the value to the maximum distance you want for the raytracer + 1.Example:if desired max distance = 8, set this to 9</comment></block></value><statement name="DO"><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field
